entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
